description: Fabric is sourced from a storied English mill that specializes in jacquard textiles. Woven from a blend of cotton, linen, and mulberry silk. Adjustable buckled back. Corozo buttons.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 22.75" back body length, a 14.25" shoulder, and a 42.5" chest.
Two chest welt pockets. Two front waist welt pockets.
Adjustable buckled back. Lined at the front body.
Front body: 56% cotton, 37% linen, 7% mulberry silk. Back body and lining: 51% cupro, 49% cotton.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
